programme.title: The Terrible Truth
programme.desc: A juvenile-court judge investigates the tragedy of marijuana addiction. (cc).

programme.title: Perversion for Profit
programme.desc: Antipornography propaganda piece warns of the dirty magazines available on newsstands across the country. Narrated by George Putnam.

programme.title: I Dood It
programme.desc: A sketchy remake of Buster Keaton's "Spite Marriage" stars Red Skelton as a tailor courting a dancer, who marries him to make her wandering-eye boyfriend jealous, but the new husband proves his mettle and wins her over when he thwarts Nazi spies. The film title came from Skelton's popular radio-comedy show. (cc).(c)

programme.title: Good Bad Boys
programme.desc: When all of the "Our Gang"-sters, except for Spanky, decide to turn to a life of crime, he devises a plan to keep them out of trouble, that is until they cross paths with a real burglar.(c)

programme.title: Glimpses of Morocco and Algiers *
programme.desc: Short travelogue visiting the North African countries of Morocco and Algiers (now Algeria). (cc).

programme.title: Chips off the Old Block *
programme.desc: Butch the cat discovers he's a dad when someone leaves a basket full of kittens on his doorstep. (cc).

programme.title: Film That Was Lost *
programme.desc: A study of film-preservation efforts. Included are clips from early newsreels featuring world leaders, such as Theodore Roosevelt, Queen Victoria and King George V. (cc).

programme.title: California Mail *
programme.desc: A cowboy has to fight crooked characters to win a pony express contract. (cc).

programme.title: Between Two Fires *
programme.desc: An undercover detective must uncover the truth and figure out who stole two million dollars in bonds.

programme.title: Tarzan and the Amazons
programme.desc: The jungle man (Johnny Weissmuller) vs. a tribe of deadly females. Brenda Joyce, Johnny Sheffield, Maria Ouspenskaya, Henry Stephenson, Shirley O'Hara, Barton MacLane. Anders: Don Douglas. Splivens: J.M. Kerrigan. Kurt Neumann directed. (cc).

programme.title: Man on the Flying Trapeze *
programme.desc: A henpecked husband's involvement with burglars lands him in trouble. W.C. Fields, Mary Brian, Kathleen Howard, Walter Brennan. Fields is funny, but this is not one of his best vehicles. Clyde Bruckman directed. (cc).

programme.title: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: Entry in the "Crime Does Not Pay" series examines how thieves steal merchandise and then fence it through a legitimate business for sale to the public.

programme.desc: A gunman is hired to rid a town of outlaws. Richard Widmark, Henry Fonda, Anthony Quinn. Jessie: Dolores Michaels. Lilly: Dorothy Malone. Edward Dmytryk directed. (cc).

programme.desc: Best Picture based on the Edna Ferber bestseller about Texas cattlemen, oil, troubled romances and racial injustice chronicles the lives of one proud family from the 1930s to the '50s. James Dean's final film; George Stevens won a Best Director Oscar. (cc).

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Western version of Akira Kurosawa's "The Seven Samurai," about a group of American gunfighters who are hired to defend the beleaguered peasants of a Mexican village from the ravages of outlaws led by a nefarious bandit. (cc).

programme.title: Hang 'em High
programme.desc: A rancher survives a vicious attack by a lynch mob who accused him of stealing cattle, and he sets out for revenge by becoming a deputy marshal and agreeing to bring in alive the men he is looking for so they can face trials. (cc).(c)

programme.title: Cavalcade of Archery
programme.desc: Howard Hill displays his mastery of the bow and arrow. Hill also directed the short, which is narrated by Knox Manning.(c)

programme.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
programme.desc: William Wellman directed this Western classic about mob violence. Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Anthony Quinn, Mary Beth Hughes, William Eythe, Harry Morgan, Jane Darwell. Davies: Harry Davenport. Tyler: Matt Briggs. Tetley: Frank Conroy. Farnley: Marc Lawrence. Darby: Victor Kilian. Mrs. Larch: Margaret Hamilton. Written by Dudley Nichols. (cc).(c)

programme.title: The Last Installment
programme.desc: Convict Clyde Peeler (Cameron Mitchell) becomes enamored of a famous criminal while reading about the bad guy's legendary exploits. However, he learns a lesson when his idol goes to prison for life. (cc).(c)

programme.title: The Narrow Margin
programme.desc: A tough cop is assigned to protect a mobster's wife on a cross-country train that is taking her to testify against her husband and his criminal cronies. (cc).

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about three Navy lawyers charged with defending two marines accused of killing a third during a disciplinary action at the U.S. base in Guantanamo, Cuba. (cc).

programme.title: Twilight of Honor
programme.desc: A promising young lawyer gets a big break when he's forced to defend a difficult client in a murder case. (cc).

programme.title: Grand Hotel

programme.title: It Happened One Night
programme.desc: Frank Capra's classic about a spoiled heiress on the lam from her father, and the gruff reporter who hooks up with her as they travel northward, engage in a series of misadventures and begin to fall for each other. The first film to sweep all five major Oscars: Best Picture, Director (Capra), Screenplay (Robert Riskin), Actor (Clark Gable) and Actress (Claudette Colbert). (cc).(c)

programme.title: Important News
programme.desc: A small-town editor (Charles 'Chic' Sale) must decide which of two big scoops should be front-page news. James Stewart has an unbilled cameo as the editor's nephew/assistant. Directed by Edwin Lawrence. (repeat).(c)

programme.title: The Narrow Margin
programme.desc: A tough cop is assigned to protect a mobster's wife on a cross-country train that is taking her to testify against her husband and his criminal cronies. (cc).

programme.title: I Married a Witch
programme.desc: The spirit of a 17th century sorceress rematerializes in 1942 New England and falls head over heels in love with a young, handsome politician. (cc).

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: An alcoholic matinee idol helps out an aspiring performer, who becomes a star; and while her career skyrockets, his declines. (cc).(c)

programme.title: The Three Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Joanne Woodward's Oscar-winning performance as a housewife with three personalities. Lee J. Cobb, David Wayne. (cc).

programme.title: Sunday in New York
programme.desc: A woman visits her brother in Manhattan after her boyfriend threatens to break up with her because she won't sleep with him. During the course of the day, both brother and sister find themselves in increasingly complex romantic complications. Norman Krasna adapted the screenplay from his hit Broadway play. (cc).

programme.title: Let's Make Love
programme.desc: A billionaire uses a fake name to feign being an actor in order to get into a Broadway show satirizing him, but he winds up falling for the beautiful woman playing opposite him. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Two male musicians go on the lam posing as women in an all-girl orchestra after witnessing a gangland massacre in 1929 Chicago. (cc).(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Clara Bow scored a sensation in this Jazz Age silent about a salesgirl out to land her wealthy employer (Antonio Moreno). Monty: William Austin. Adela: Jacqueline Gadsdon. Mrs. Van Norman: Julia Swayne Gordon. Molly: Priscilla Bonner. Directed by Clarence Badger.(n)

programme.title: The Movies
programme.desc: A country boy (Lloyd Hamilton) heads to the big city, where he butts heads with an ill-tempered man and winds up landing a job as a motion-picture star's stand-in, which he discovers is not all fame and glory. Written and directed by Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle.(n)

programme.desc: An ex-con mulls robbing an armored car to help his disabled sister.(n)

programme.desc: The devil agrees to release a recently murdered gangster back to Earth if he'll take over the body of an honest judge and make him do bad deeds. The criminal, eager to settle the score with his killer, finds out being bad isn't so easy in his new guise. (cc).(n)

programme.title: I Confess

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons

programme.desc: Desna and Virginia prepare a cover story to tell the ladies following an entanglement with Roller. Also, Desna's dream salon is falling apart, and Virginia goes missing but returns with a concocted tale that sends Desna on an unforeseen journey. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Claws

programme.desc: Married biologists find their son and housekeeper murdered in their home, prompting an investigation that has the wife revisiting her sorority days. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A depression-era sports drama about the legendary racehorse, Seabiscuit, and the three men who saw him to victory. Together, the three work to help the famed horse to several symbolic victories that helped to inspire a downtrodden 1930s America. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: The lives of a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: When Mark Whitacre discovers that his company is involved in price-fixing, he becomes an informant for the FBI. Convinced he'll be hailed as a hero for his efforts, he agrees to wear a wire and gathers evidence to convict his bosses. Unfortunately, both the case and Whitacre's integrity are compromised when the FBI agents discover that he isn't the saintly figure he made himself out to be. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Anything Else
programme.desc: Woody Allen wrote and directed this mediocre “Annie Hall” wannabe about a writer (Jason Biggs) frustrated by his neurotic girlfriend (Christina Ricci). Allen also costars as the writer's mentor. Cinematographer Darius Khondji make glorious use of New York City locales. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Girl in the River The Price of Forgiveness
programme.desc: The story of an 18-year-old Pakistani girl who was targeted for death by her family but survived. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton!
programme.desc: A movie star with a bad-boy reputation is convinced by his manager to hold a dating contest to help improve his image. After winning the contest, a clerk from a small town discovers that both the actor and a co-worker are vying for her affection. She finds herself in the middle of a love triangle between her closest friend and a dream date. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: A United Kingdom

programme.title: Gifted

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic, a paraplegic war veteran named Jake Sully volunteers for a mission on the planet Pandora, a hostile environment where human beings can only survive by remotely controlling alien avatars. However, Jake soon realizes that the Na'vi, a race of creatures native to Pandora, are being threatened by his own people, and he decides to join them in fighting back against mankind. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Everything, Everything

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (cc).(n)

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Adaptation of the British miniseries concerning suspicious events that set a rising congressman and a dogged reporter on a dangerous collision course. A U.S. congressman Stephen Collins is ascending the ladder of power, but his bid for the presidency hits the skids after his research assistant/mistress is viciously murdered. Now top reporter Cal McAffrey is eager to get the truth. But McAffrey has just walked into a major cover-up. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Watchmen

programme.title: The Alamo

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy

(cc).

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Ranking Jankesa
programme.desc: Krzysztof "Jankes" Jankowski przedstawia subiektywny ranking tego, co najlepsze w sieci, muzyce, świecie show-biznesu i wszystkich innych interesujących rzeczy, którymi dzieli się z widzami.

programme.title: Mobmania

programme.title: Miejska lista
programme.desc: Prowadząca program, Ola, odwiedza polskie miasta i zachęca ludzi, by wybierali klipy, które chcieliby usłyszeć.

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.

programme.title: Hity na czasie

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.
